bookdescription.booktitle: 365 Stories from Around the World Hardcover – 4 January 2015
bookdescription.author: Om Books Editorial Team
bookdescription.publisher: Om Books International (4 January 2015); Om Books International, 107 Ansari Road, Daryaganj, New Delhi-110002, India, Tel.(11) 4000 9000, Fax, (11) 23278091
bookdescription.description: Do you often catch yourself daydreaming about what it would be like to live in a foreign land or in another era? If you have, this is the perfect book for you-right from the barren sands of Arabia to the icy cold polar regions of Antarctica- there's a story here from everywhere for everyone! Go on, open this book and travel all over the world without getting off your couch!.

bookdescription.booktitle: 101 People Who Changed the World Hardcover – 24 April 2019
bookdescription.author: Om Books Editorial Team
bookdescription.publisher: Om Books International (4 January 2015); Om Books International, 107 Ansari Road, Daryaganj, New Delhi-110002, India, Tel.(11) 4000 9000, Fax, (11) 23278091
bookdescription.description: Sheer grit and determination helps some people to rise above the rest. Their lives contribute in making the world a happier and better place. Browse through the pages of this book and learn about their remarkable achievements which are truly motivating and inspiring!.

bookdescription.booktitle: Large Print: Moral Stories Learning For Life (Hindi) Hardcover – 1 January 2012
bookdescription.author: Om Books Editorial Team
bookdescription.publisher: Om Books International (4 January 2015); Om Books International, 107 Ansari Road, Daryaganj, New Delhi-110002, India, Tel.(11) 4000 9000, Fax, (11) 23278091
bookdescription.description: A delightful book of moral Stories, old and new, where each story teaches a lesson to cherish for life. The fascinating illustrations bring these stories to life and make story-time the best time of the day!.
